Dialog.Content: ...She should be back by now.
Linus would you please stop pacing? This is Jo we're talking about, she'll be back.

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: And what if they find us while she's away? She's our lifeline in this city, without her protection we're good as dead.

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: A little optomism wouldn't kill you, you know? We've made it this far, and you're getting a hang of using that weird sword of yours right?
<knock knock knock>

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: ...that wasn't the knock we agreed on...

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: ...maybe she forgot?

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: That's not a risk I'm willing to take. Ugh, I knew this apartment was a terrible hiding place! We're going to have to fight past them.

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: Um, why don't we check the peephole first?

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: No, they'll be able to tell someone's looking through it. Here's the plan: I'll throw the door open and we'll rush them. Hopefully they won't be expecting that.

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: ...Okay, I'm ready. On three?

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: Yeah. One... Two...

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: THREE!
AAAAAAHHH!!!

Dialog.Title: Ex-Fixer
Dialog.Content: Haha! Woah there! Glad to see you're both on your toes!

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: That wasn't the password we came up with.

Dialog.Title: Ex-Fixer
Dialog.Content: Hm? Password? Ohhh yes yes, sorry it slipped my mind. I was very preoccupied with losing my tail. You wouldn't believe how big your bounties have gotten.

Dialog.Title: Ex-Fixer
Dialog.Content: Anyway, perhaps you'll forgive me in exchange for... pizza??

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: ...What toppings?

Dialog.Title: Ex-Fixer
Dialog.Content: Bacon, sausage, and pepperoni of course. Kids like you need lots of protein to grow strong!

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: Hm... Forgiven.

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: Mhm, you're off the hook. This time.

Dialog.Title: Ex-Fixer
Dialog.Content: Have you made any more progress with that ruins sword of yours, Linus?

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: Nof reahy, ah feeh hike-

Dialog.Title: Ex-Fixer
Dialog.Content: Finish chewing first.

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: No, hardly any. I feel like I've hit a plateau on what I can discern with the tools available.

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: The researchers kept calling it the "Nymane Key". It's a pretty potent weapon already, but I feel like I've only managed to scratch the surface of what it's capable of.

Dialog.Title: Ex-Fixer
Dialog.Content: Well the people you took it from certainly seem to think it's quite valuable, based on who they've been sending after us. The ones who assaulted our previous hideout were a Grade 2 office.

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: Ugh... I wish they'd just leave us alone...

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: Anyway, the only thing I've discerned recently is that if this array of runes is powered along with this one it projects a shield.

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: A lot of these runes are worn down, damaged; I think if I could get them working it would open up so many more of the Key's functions. Maybe with a sufficient amount of power forcefully pushed through them...

Dialog.Title: Ex-Fixer
Dialog.Content: Does it need to be hooked up to a power plant then?

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: Not electrical power. The Key seems to run on... well, I'm not entirely sure how to define it. All I know is if I could unlock its full potential... it would probably be able to manipulate the fabric of reality itself.

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: Well that's not ominous at all. No wonder they want it back so bad...

Dialog.Title: Ex-Fixer
Dialog.Content: All the more reason to make sure no one else gets their hands on it.

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: But so you need some kind of anomalous power source? I... I might have something that could help?

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: Yeah?

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: You've heard of the Library right? I got an invitation-

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: ...the library? Sheire no offense but I've already scouered all the local book stores and-

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: No no not A library, THE Library. It became a Star of the City lately, everyone's been talking about it. You really don't pay any attention to local gossip huh?

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: ...I have more important things to focus on...

Dialog.Title: Ex-Fixer
Dialog.Content: May I see that?

Dialog.Title: Ex-Fixer
Dialog.Content: Hm...

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: If there's anywhere that would have what he needs to figure that sword out it'd be there right?

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: Wait... is this the one that no one ever returns from? I think I remember hearing something about the Thumb getting wiped out because of it?

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: Oh, so you did manage to pick up on some gossip after all. Yeah, it's supposed to be pretty dangerous, but if it'll help us unlock that Key of yours then maybe we won't have to run anymore!

Dialog.Title: Ex-Fixer
Dialog.Content: Hm, it certainly is tempting. I suspect that's how it lured in its previous victims. I'll go investigate it, you two stay here.

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: Eh? You're going alone?

Dialog.Title: Ex-Fixer
Dialog.Content: Hm? Of course. I'm not about to bring two kids with me into a potential death trap.

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: Hey, we're not kids anymore! I've been getting better with the Shawl and Linus has gotten a handle on his Key; we're not as strong as you yet but we can help!

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: I'd rather none of us go. It sounds needlessly risky.

Dialog.Title: Ex-Fixer
Dialog.Content: Linus, it's only a matter of time until we can't run anymore. Everything depends on that "Nymane Key" of yours. It's, well, the key to our survival.

Dialog.Title: Ex-Fixer
Dialog.Content: And I'll be damned if something happens to either of you because I let you waltz into danger with me. I'll go gather what information I can and then be back before you know it.

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: But...

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: And what if something happens to you because we let you run off on your own, Jo! All the close calls we've gotten out of we got out of as a team; if we're not watching eachother's backs then no one is.

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: Yeah, either we all go or none of us do.

Dialog.Title: Ex-Fixer
Dialog.Content: Haha, always so stubborn...

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: What's wrong?

Dialog.Title: Ex-Fixer
Dialog.Content: We have company. Grab your weapons.

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: Dammit, already?! How'd they find us so soon??

Dialog.Title: Ex-Fixer
Dialog.Content: Unfortunately we're running out of good places to hide. We'll fight past them and head to our last safehouse. You know where to go yes?

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: Wait, if we sign this invitation it's supposed to teleport us away from here to the Library! We might be able to just hide there for a bit without going through the "ordeal" it talks about.

Dialog.Title: Ex-Fixer
Dialog.Content: Not a bad idea. Here, give it to me.

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: Are you certain? We can't be sure how this thing works.

Dialog.Title: Ex-Fixer
Dialog.Content: Yes, now both of you sign it. We're out of time.

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: Shit!

Dialog.Title: Hunter
Dialog.Content: There they are! Open fire!

Dialog.Title: Ex-Fixer
Dialog.Content: Ah, they brought guns this time. They're really investing quite a lot in getting those artifacts back.

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: Linus, your turn! Hurry!

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: Dammit...

Dialog.Title: Ex-Fixer
Dialog.Content: Ahaha! Come on then! Face me in melee!

Dialog.Title: Hunter
Dialog.Content: Shit! Her armor's bullet proof!

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: Let's hope this Library doesn't force us to fight...

Dialog.Title: Servant
Dialog.Content: Huh, I remember seeing the open bounty on those three before coming here. That was no small sum. I even considered going after them myself.

Dialog.Title: Servant
Dialog.Content: They look like small fry, but if they've survived this long and are even willing to take on a Star of the City by themselves, then maybe there's more to them than meets the eye.

Dialog.Title: Servant
Dialog.Content: It's bizarre seeing someone wearing full platemail in the City though, and what's up with that girl's feather shawl thing? They look more like LARPers than fugitives.

Dialog.Title: Library Director
Dialog.Content: 'LARPers'?

Dialog.Title: Servant
Dialog.Content: Uh, it's nothing ma'am.

Dialog.Title: Library Director
Dialog.Content: I'm interested in that 'Nymane Key'. After you've received our guests: those who were trying to retrieve it will no doubt come here looking for the book containing it.

Dialog.Title: Servant
Dialog.Content: Yeah, I wonder what that thing is though? Other than a very impractical looking rusty sword. It looks like something that'd come from the Ruins.

Dialog.Title: Library Director
Dialog.Content: Acquire their books and perhaps that mystery will be unraveled.

Dialog.Title: Servant
Dialog.Content: Yeah, yeah, I got it.

Dialog.Title: Ex-Fixer
Dialog.Content: Everyone alright?

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: Yeah. Jeez that was a close call. Linus?

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: Ugh... dangit.

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: Linus? What's wrong?

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: Forgot to grab the pizza...

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: Linus.

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: Don't look at me like that, Shei! You know how I feel about wasted food.

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: Right. Sorry. Just remind yourself you're not in the Outskirts anymore okay? Food is abundant here.

Dialog.Title: Ex-Fixer
Dialog.Content: Hahaha, I'll be sure to treat us all to a proper feast after this is over.

Dialog.Title: Library Director
Dialog.Content: Greetings, dear guests.

Dialog.Title: Library Director
Dialog.Content: I am Angela, the director and librarian of my role's namesake.

Dialog.Title: Ex-Fixer
Dialog.Content: Hello! I am Johanna Seraphine, once a Grade 1 Fixer and now the steadfast guardian of these two.

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: Uh, hi! I'm Sheire! Nice to meet you.

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: ...Linus.

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: C'mon Linus, be polite.

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: Sorry, it just feels weird to be cordial with someone who's probably hoping we'll die here...

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: Right, uh, speaking of: I don't suppose we could just... wait here for a bit until the people chasing us give up, and then leave peacefully?

Dialog.Title: Library Director
Dialog.Content: The rules of the invitation are clear: you must either overcome the ordeal before you, or be converted into books yourselves.

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: Turned into a book? That's unsettling.

Dialog.Title: Ex-Fixer
Dialog.Content: It was worth an attempt young Sheire, but it seems the only option is to press forward.

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: *sigh* Why does it always end in violence...?

Dialog.Title: Library Director
Dialog.Content: May you find your book in this place.

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: Hey wait-! Oh, there she goes.

Dialog.Title: Ex-Fixer
Dialog.Content: Well then. Stay behind me, and if things start to look bad we retreat.

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: We've got your back, Jo!

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: Yeah, let's do this.
